channel.title: [PI] Mining gems || need help rep++

item.title: [PI] Mining gems || need help rep++
item.dc:creator: @chaske1 chaske1
item.description:
@chaske1 wrote:

hi,
i got this code for gaining gem’s during mining.

public void mineOre() { if (c.getItems().addItem(oreType,1)) { c.startAnimation(EMOTE); c.sendMessage("You manage to mine some ore."); c.getPA().addSkillXP(exp * Config.MINING_EXPERIENCE, c.playerMining); c.getPA().refreshSkill(c.playerMining); c.miningTimer = getMiningTimer(oreType); if (Misc.random(25) == 10) { c.getItems().addItem(RANDOM_GEMS[(int)(RANDOM_GEMS.length * Math.random())], 1); c.sendMessage("You find a gem!"); } }
I know i can make an other Random_gems, but atm i added uncut onyx in the random gems. I want onyx uncut to be gained less then the other gems, how do i to that? please help, i’ll rep++ if worked

Read full topic
